title: Xbox Series X Preview Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.28.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate can be!

Head to http://logitechg.com and use code KFGAMES for 10% off select products!

Go to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily to get started with a FREE online visit!

Blessing and Tim talk about Xbox Series X previews, Mass Effect Legendary Edition being delayed, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
:: - Housekeeping
Donktober begins this Saturday. Me and Barrett are playing through the entirety of DK64. You can catch that live, every Saturday this month starting at noon pacific time and then later on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, Mohammed Mohammed, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:40 - Xbox Series X hands-on previews are up!
00:18:00 - The Mass Effect Collection is still coming, but not in 2020 - Jeff Grubb @ VentureBeat
00:29:33 - A Resident Evil Netflix show is incoming - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:34:18 - Farmville is shutting down at the end of the year - Zynga Support page
00:37:50 - Out today
00:41:00 -  Upstart
00:42:30 -  HIMS 
00:43:39 -  Logitech 
 Reader mail   -
00:45:30 - Tomorrow, we are getting our first full look at the second Pokémon DLC, The Crown Tundra. Like the Isle of Armor, it will bring back around 100 Pokémon into the current gen. What is the one Pokémon you want back the most, and which generation do you hope gets the most love?  - Gondors Condor
00:52:00 - What will be your preferred way to play next gen games - 30FPS/4K or 60FPS/1440P? Would this change depending on the type of TV you have? - Jason
00:55:40 - Squad Up: ProphetGK(Xbox)
00:57:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Blessing and Imran
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
